name: Pokemon Brown (ROM Hack)
description: Pokémon Brown is a Hack Rom of Pokémon Red, created in 2004 by Koolboyman. It is elapsed in the new region of Rijon, which is south of Johto. The first 151 Pokémon in the Rijon Pokédex are the same Pokémon from the Kanto Dex. In the 2009 remake, the game expanded the Dex to 224 Pokémon. The 2014 remake added one more: Sylveon. The game also includes five new Elemental Types.
